title: (x) flowing tears - Industria {Stephen}
content:
![flowing tears logo](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419130608im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/391.gif)   
   
   
this is a logo for a band (excellent one!) named flowing tears.   
   
but does anyone know what the font is called?
author: disodium

comments.content:
Anders,   
   
It's Neville Brody's Industria.   
   
 [http://www.myfonts.com/Search?searchtext=industria](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419130608/http:/www.myfonts.com/Search?searchtext=industria)   
   
Stephen

Thanks, Stephen!   
   
I really didn't expect such a quick answer. This forum seems to be useful...
